attributes.title: 2011 Volkswagen Tiguan 1.4 TSI Bluemotion Trend&Fun (118kW)

attributes.description: The Hammer !! The greatest 'Q' car ever and recognised around the world for the classic it is. These cars were handbuilt at the factory, taking 5 times as long to complete as any other saloon in conjunction with Porsche who redesigned the chassis , suspension and drive train. The widened front wings  did not fit the W124 assembly line so the cars had to be assembled by Porsche. An interesting time in history for Porsche. As they completed this project they went on to do the same for Audi with the RS2, using the same department and the same men to produce the next instant classic. The 500e is in impeccable condition and has had but 3 owners in 30 years, all of which i know and respect for preserving such a car. There are only 4 known in this country. An excellent investment, and a very useful moveable asset not to mention the pride of anyones collection........ Not sure you will get another opportunity to buy one locally judging by the owners of the other 3 !!

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877215217. Infotainment screen with Navigation, apple/android carplay etc worth R15000 FREE. This vehicle comes with a balance of 3year/unlimited kms service plan, warranty and roadside assistance. This is the ideal vehicle for the first time buyer or the perfect car for your child`s first vehicle, whether it being for university, college or matric. It has one of the highest Euro NCAP safety ratings in its segment. It boasts with its zippy yet economical 1. 5 litre engine. Standard features include Handsfree Bluetooth, radio/cd and an UPGRADE of ANDROID AUTO™ and APPLE CARPLAY®, aircon, power steering, electric windows together with a multi-function steering wheel. Your or your loved one will most definitely be in safe “wheels”.

We do a 108 Quality check on every vehicle and we do roadworthy upon delivery. The price excludes dealer fees. Errors and Omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply
